author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...COSME FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE LATER TODAY...
summary: ...COSME FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE LATER TODAY... As of 15:00 UTC MON JUN 09 2025 the center of Cosme was located near 14.5, -113.3 with movement WNW at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 994 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...COSME FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE LATER TODAY... As of 15:00 UTC MON JUN 09 2025 the center of Cosme was located near 14.5, -113.3 with movement WNW at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 994 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Cosme (EP3/EP032025)
